document.masterDocTitle: Oribatid mites (Acari: Oribatida) recorded from Ireland: Catalogue, historical records, species habitats and geographical distribution, combinations, variations and synonyms

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Oribatid mites (Acari: Oribatida) recorded from Ireland: Catalogue, historical records, species habitats and geographical distribution, combinations, variations and synonyms

bibRefCitation.author: Berlese
bibRefCitation.refString: Berlese, A. (1904) Acari nuovi. Manipulus III. Redia, 2, 10 - 32.

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Malaconothrus monodactylus (Michael, 1888)
*

· Original name:
Nothrus monodactylus Michael, 1888
.

· In: British
Oribatidae , Vols. I
and II. Ray Soc., London. 656 pp.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Malaconothrus ( Malaconothrus) monodactylus (Michael) Subías, 2004
.

materialsCitation.location: Dublin, Laois, Limerick, Mayo and Wexford
materialsCitation.stateProvince: Dublin, Laois, Limerick, Mayo and Wexford

paragraph.materialsCitation: Counties: Dublin, Laois, Limerick, Mayo and Wexford .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Malaconothrus purvisi Luxton, 1987
*

· Original name:
Malaconothrus purvisi Luxton, 1987
.

· In: Mites of the genus
Malaconothrus
from the British islands. Journal of Natural History, 21, 199–206.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Malaconothrus ( Malaconothrus ) purvisi (Luxton) Subías, 2004
. Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Wet grazed pasture and
Iris Bog
near seashore ( Luxton 1987 ). Counties: Wexford .

·
Malaconothrus pygmaeus Aoki, 1969

· Original name:
Malaconothrus pygmaeus Aoki, 1969
.
· In: Taxonomic investigations on free-living mites in the subalpine forest on Shiga Heights IBP Area. III. Cryptostigmata. Bulletin of the National Science Museum Tokyo , 12, 117–141.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Malaconothrus ( Malaconothrus ) pygmaeus (Aoki) Subías, 2014
. Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Fungal sporocarps ( O’Connell 1994 ). Counties: Kilkenny .

·
Malaconothrus tardus (Michael, 1888)
*

· Original name:
Nothrus tardus , Michael, 1888
.
· In: British Oribatidae, Vols. I and II. Ray Soc., London. 656 pp.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Angelia tarda (Berlese) Berlese, 1896
;
Trimalaconothrus tardus (Michael) van der Hammen, 1959
;
Malaconothrus ( Trimalaconthrus ) tardus (Michael) Subías, 2004
. Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s :
Sphagnum ( Halbert 1915 )
; moss on trunk of yew (
Arroyo et al. 2013c
). Counties: Kerry and Mayo .

·
Tyrphonothrus glaber (Michael, 1898)
*

· Original name:
Nothrus glaber Michael, 1888
.
· In: British Oribatidae . Vols. I and II. Ray Soc., London. 656 pp.

· Synonyms:
Nothrus simplex Banks, 1895

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Wet
Sphagnum ( Halbert 1915 )
. Counties: Mayo .

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Tyrphonothrus maior (Berlese, 1910)

· Original name:
Malaconothrus maior Berlese, 1910
. · In: Acari nuovi. Manipulus V, VI.
Redia ,
6, 199–234.

·
Historical combinations/variations: T
rimalaconothrus maior (Berlese) van der Hammen, 1959 ;
Tyrphonothrus ( Tyrphonothrus ) maior (Berlese) Subías, 2004
.
Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Bog, grassland and heather on peat ( Longworth 1973 ). Counties: Mayo .
